greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table read by antidiagonals where A(n,k) is the number of n X k binary arrays in which both the sequence of rows and the sequence of columns are (independently) aperiodic.
comment: A sequence of length n is aperiodic if all n rotations of its entries are distinct.
xref: First and last columns are A027375. Main diagonal is A265627.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Feb 04 2019
